thread.title: Chrissy Teigen jokes about John Legend's resemblance to cartoon character Arthur - and the internet loves it
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen jokes about John Legend's resemblance to cartoon character Arthur - and the internet loves it

title: Chrissy Teigen jokes about John Legend's resemblance to cartoon character Arthur - and the internet loves it
text:
Chrissy Teigen jokes about John Legend's resemblance to cartoon character Arthur - and the internet loves it February 22, 2017 by Sharnaz Shahid Chrissy Teigen took to Twitter to respond to the internet's claims that her husband John Legend looks like beloved cartoon character Arthur Leave a comment 
Chrissy Teigen is the queen of the Twitter! The 31-year-old delighted fans this week when she went online to respond to claims that her husband John Legend looks like cartoon character Arthur . It all began when a Twitter user shared a photo of acclaimed singer John alongside an image of the famous cartoon animal, and wrote: "John Legend look like Arthur lowkey." In response to the meme, Chrissy posted a picture of Arthur's clenched fist and remarked: "John when you tell him he looks like Arthur." Her 38-year-old husband then hit back: "@chrissyteigen I hadn't even heard of this Arthur character til now. Was he around when I was a kid?" [sic] John when you tell him he looks like Arthur pic.twitter.com/0NW3NDtAb1 
WATCH: Baby Luna stars in John Legend's adorable new music video 
Fellow followers were quick to join in with the fun, with one fan sharing a picture of John in a yellow turtleneck - a scene from La La Land - with an Arthur mask layered on top of his face. Another shared a series of snaps of John and zoomed in twice on his hand, which looked remarkably like Arthur's. Meanwhile, fans of the stars heaped praise on Chrissy's wit. "I feel like Chrissy is the with-the-times teenager and john is the old man that doesn't understand the internet," wrote one person, while another added: "y'all @chrissyteigen is better than any of us on twitter. ANY AND ALL OF US." [sic] John Legend look like Arthur lowkey pic.twitter.com/bfeG3cYo4M
